project.description: Run VcRunTests on Ubuntu32 bit mac

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe
ulimit -c unlimited #export VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=27000@192.168.163.60 export PYTHONPATH=/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages:/mnt/nfs/shared/tamil_temp:$PYTHONPATH export BOOST_DIR=/mnt/nfs/shared/vikram/boost-1.53.0 export VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=7650@licenseserver
#Set VC #export VECTORCAST_DIR=/home/vectorindia/.VCAST export VECTORCAST_DIR=/home/vectorindia/.VCAST_89129
#Install vctools cd $WORKSPACE #cp -r ${LINUX_RELEASE_DIR}/Linux/*.tgz $WORKSPACE #tar -zxvf *.tgz #cd release #./install.sh
#export VECTORCAST_DIR=/mnt/nfs/shared/.VCAST_REGRESSION/86438/LINUX
#Check version $VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --version $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast --version
#Get the tests cp -r ${LINUX_GIT_DIR}/tests $WORKSPACE
#CMake and run VcRunTests cd $WORKSPACE mkdir tbuild cd tbuild cmake ../tests -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=g++ export _VC_RUNTEST_RETURN_CODE_=0 $VECTORCAST_DIR/vpython VcRunTests.py || export _VC_RUNTEST_RETURN_CODE_=$?
#Collect Result #$VECTORCAST_DIR/vpython VcCollectResult.py --db=/mnt/nfs/shared/Jenkins_Result/vcshell.db --tag=linux32
#$VECTORCAST_DIR/vpython VcRegressionResult.py --db=/mnt/nfs/shared/Jenkins_Result/regression.db --tag=linux32 --storeresult
cd $WORKSPACE/release/examples ./buildall.sh export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LINUX_VECTORCAST_DIR/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH ./vcdbcapi
exit /b $_VC_RUNTEST_RETURN_CODE_
